pages.text:
Contact Us
.entry-header
Do you have comments or questions about one of our performances or about Freeport Players in general? Do you have a great play or program idea? Do you want to volunteer behind the scenes or be notified about our auditions, performances, and other activities? You can reach us at:
Freeport Community Players
PO Box 483
Freeport, ME 04032
info@fcponline.org
Visit us on FaceBook
Freeport Players is on Facebook. Our fans can view performance and audition information, receive reminders posted to our wall, and view photos and videos as they become available.
OUR MISSION
Freeport Players is a community-based organization that runs predominately on volunteer labor and provides a variety of theatrical performances and theater-based opportunities to local and regional adults and children with the purpose of building a lively community through creative endeavors that build skills, enrich, inform, and entertain.  In short:  Think. Laugh. Feel. Create.
OUR LEADERSHIP, available at:  info@fcponline.org
Board of Directors, 2025:
Judy Lloyd,
President
jelloyd68 @yahoo.com
Mike Powers,
Vice President
Chip Lawrence,
Treasurer
Betsy Roper,
Secretary

Tais De Los Reyes
Brian Halamar
Nancy Kenneally
Janet Lawrence
Dorothy Shull
Marguerite Walker
.entry-content
.entry-footer
